dialogue.zh:
嗨 那裡! First time here?
こんにちは there! First time here?

dialogue.text: Yeah, it is. I’m not sure what to order.
dialogue.zh:
Yeah, it 是. 我’m not 當然 what to 點餐.
Yeah, it 私. 私’m not もちろん what to 注文.

dialogue.text: No worries. Do you want something hot or iced?
dialogue.zh:
不 worries. 你 想要 東西 熱 or 冰的?
いいえ worries. Do あなた want something ホット or アイス?

冰的, 請.
アイス, お願いします.

dialogue.text: Do you like it strong or mild?
dialogue.zh:
你 like it strong or mild?
Do あなた like it strong or mild?

Mild.
Mild.

dialogue.text: Would you like coffee or something with tea?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like 咖啡 or 東西 with 茶?
Would あなた like コーヒー or something with お茶?

咖啡 是 fine.
コーヒー 私 fine.

dialogue.text: An iced latte is a good starter.
dialogue.zh:
An 冰的 拿鐵 是 a good starter.
An アイス ラテ 私 a good starter.

Sounds good.
Sounds good.

What size would 你 like?
What size would あなた like?

中, 請.
ミディアム, お願いします.

任何 糖?
Any 砂糖?

Just a little.
Just a little.

Regular 牛奶 是 好的?
Regular ミルク 私 わかりました?

是的, regular 牛奶.
はい, regular ミルク.

你 想要 less 冰?
Do あなた want less 氷?

Normal 冰 是 fine.
Normal 氷 私 fine.

here or to go?
For here or to go?

To go.
To go.

Would 你 like a straw?
Would あなた like a straw?

是的, 請.
はい, お願いします.

Anything to eat today?
Anything to eat today?

Not today.
Not today.

Alright, one 中 冰的 拿鐵.
Alright, one ミディアム アイス ラテ.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: It’ll be ready in a minute.
dialogue.zh:
It’ll be ready in a minute.
It’ll be ready in a minute.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

dialogue.text: Next time, ask me for recommendations too.
dialogue.zh:
Next time, ask me recommendations too.
Next time, ask me for recommendations too.

我 will!
私 will!
